long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shielded is a powerful Chrome extension designed to protect your inbox from fraud and phishing attacks. With advanced algorithms, Shielded scans your emails in real-time, alerting you to potential scams and suspicious activity. Compatible with popular email management services like Gmail and Roundcube, Shielded keeps your inbox safe and secure, allowing you to browse and manage your emails with peace of mind. Safeguard your inbox with Shielded today!
